nodes.text: Cale's Lok Outpost was an outpost operated by Zabrak male slicer, Cale Herron. This outpost, situated on a mountain on Lok, capped with a Jedi shrine, was located between the Westerly region and Nym Protectorate.

Cale's Lok Outpost was a location in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Cale's Lok Outpost was added to the game as part of the "Death Troopers" pre-questline "Something is Obviously Wrong", released with the "Game Update 13" on September 30, 2009.
